info.title: BrandLovers Marketplace API V1
info.description: Allows sellers to: 1) Load products definitions to the BrandLovers marktplace. 2) Receive and update orders status. 3) Receive and update shipping information. 4) Receive and update customer tickets. All requests consume and return application/json content. All request must be authenticated and use HTTPS.

200.description: Success! Server received your request and will start background processing.

401.description: Access denied. You're not authenticated or token expired. Check your request header the `authorization` field is required.

post.description: This endpoint is meant to create new products in BrandLovers' Marketplace using `skuSellerId` as a primary key. This endpoint expects a JSON document with an array of products. The server will load each product as an individual item that can be manipulated using your own `skuSellerId`. All requests to This endpoint are idenpontent with respect of the `skuSellerId`, this means that once a `skuSellerId` is created it cannot be re-created using this tool. In order to update use the PUT method with the correct `skuSellerId`. You can also use the POST /product to create a single product per request
post.summary: Allows new products from the seller to be loaded into the marketplace

parameters.description: Authorization token. The Authorization token can be found in your Admin console.
parameters.name: authorization

parameters.description: JSON with a list of new products to be uploaded to the platform
parameters.name: products

401.description: Access denied. You're not authenticated or token expired. Check your request header the `authorization` field is required.

403.description: Server refused to process your request. Please check the API SLA and reduce number of requests per second.

get.description: Get a list of my products loaded into the Marketplace. This dosen't means that products are eligible for sale, just that they are loaded in the database.
get.summary: Returns a list of products loaded into BrandLovers Marketplace

parameters.description: Authorization token. The Authorization token can be found in your Admin console.
parameters.name: authorization

parameters.description: Number or items to skip when executing query. List starts at zero. If omitted will default to zero. Use this conjuction with `limit` to paginate across the results.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Number of items to retun. Defaults to 100. Max alowed is 200. Use this conjuction with `offset` to paginate across the results.
parameters.name: limit

401.description: Access denied. You're not authenticated or token expired. Check your request header the `authorization` field is required.

403.description: Server refused to process your request. Please check the API SLA and reduce number of requests per second.

404.description: Object not found. In general this means a invalid skuSellerId.

get.description: Returns detailed information of a single product with the seller `skuSellerId`. This service will return a json document with product detail, status, price, invetory among other infomarion availble in the Brand Lovers marketplace
get.summary: Returns details of a single product using the seller's `skuSellerId`

parameters.description: Authorization token. The Authorization token can be found in your Admin console.
parameters.name: authorization

parameters.description: SKU ID do Lojista.
parameters.name: skuSellerId

401.description: Access denied. You're not authenticated or token expired. Check your request header the `authorization` field is required.

403.description: Server refused to process your request. Please check the API SLA and reduce number of requests per second.

put.description: Update a single product information such as name, brand, attribute, dimension, etc. Please note that data from your request will be merged with existing data. This allows you to easliy update only certain fields without the need to re-inform the other unchanged fields. For example in order to update just the field `title` simply send just this field with new information, remaining fields will not be changed. In order to erase an item the field must be informed as its default value, for example in order to erase the `videos` field must be sent as videos:[]. The `skuSellerId` field is always mandatory in the path and in the product json Object.

parameters.description: Authorization token. The Authorization token can be found in your Admin console.
parameters.name: authorization

parameters.description: Unique Product Id (SKU) in the seller system that will be updated.
parameters.name: skuSellerId

parameters.description: New product information.
parameters.name: body

200.description: Success! Server received your request and will start background processing.

401.description: Access denied. You're not authenticated or token expired. Check your request header the `authorization` field is required.

post.description: Use this enpoint to create a single new product to the Marketplace. This enpoint expects a json document with one product. If you whant to upload multiple products in a single API call use POST /products method. The server will load each product as an individual item that can be manipulated using your own `skuSellerId`. This system is idenpontent, this means that once a `skuSellerId` is created it cannot be re-created using this tool. In order to update, edit a product use the PUT method with the correct reference to your `skuSellerId`
post.summary: Create a new product on the marketplace

parameters.description: Authorization token. The Authorization token can be found in your Admin console.
parameters.name: authorization

parameters.description: New Produt that will be create
parameters.name: product

403.description: Server refused to process your request. Please check the API SLA and reduce number of requests per second.

get.description: Returns a list with seller products status. Please note that this endpoint will not return all details of each product, just the skuSellerId and status. Also please note that this endpoint will return 250 products per call. For full details of a given procuct use GET /product/{skuSellerId}
get.summary: Returns seller products status in the marketplace

parameters.description: Number or items to skip when executing query. List starts at zero. If omitted will default to zero. Use this conjuction with `limit` to paginate across the results.
parameters.name: offset

parameters.description: Number of items to return in this query. Defaults to 250. Maximum 1000. Use this conjuction with `offset` to paginate across the results.
parameters.name: limit

put.description: Bulk enable/disable products in the marketplace. This endpoint requires an array of objects with the seller SKU `skuSellerId` and boolean value that defines if the product is enabled or not for sale. This endpoint can be used to set a single product or many products.
put.summary: Bulk enable/disable products in the marketplace

401.description: Access denied. You're not authenticated or token expired. Check your request header the `authorization` field is required.

put.description: Allows bulk update of product prices. This endpoint expects a json document with an array of products with the `skuSellerId` and the new price. Server will process each new product update individually and will ackwlodge as much updates as possible, even if a single product update fails. After this request you can query product final status with GET /product/status
put.summary: Allows bulk update of product prices.

parameters.description: Authorization token. The Authorization token can be found in your Admin console.
parameters.name: authorization

parameters.description: Data for bulk product price update
parameters.name: body

post.description: Use this service to create a new trouble ticket. Use this to include relevant information about the order, comunicate with the customer or marketplace team. Whenever possible message will be pushed to Mobile first. This is the primary mean of comunicaiton with the customer regarding orders, shippments, shippments status. New tickets will be automatically be set to 'OPEN'. Trouble tickets need to be associated with a orderId or customer. New tickets can optionally include a new message.

parameters.description: Authorization token. The Authorization token can be found in your Admin console.
parameters.name: authorization

parameters.description: JSON object with new trouble ticket
parameters.name: newTicket

401.description: Access denied. You're not authenticated or token expired. Check your request header the `authorization` field is required.

403.description: Access denied. You can only access your trouble tickets

get.description: Returns trouble ticket history with all messages exchanged. Only tickets related to your seller will be returned. Attempt to read other tickets will return 403 (acess denied).

skuSellerId.description: When applicable will include `skuSellerId` related to this error

productId.description: Brand Lovers Product ID. Use this to suggest a product association. This field is optional.

skuSellerId.description: Unique Product Id (SKU) in the seller system

productGroupId.description: Unique Product Group ID. Products with the same `productGroupId` will be grouped and displayed as a unique entry. Use `productGroupId` to group diferent SKUs that represent diferent colors, sizes, capacities, etc..

title.description: Product name as advertised by manufacturer. This how the product will be displayed in the Marketplace

gtin.description: Array of product EAN and/or ISBN and/or ASIN codes

categories.description: Array of categories associated with this product

images.description: List of valid Product image URLs. HTTP or HTTPS are valid. HTTPS is prefered.

videos.description: List of videos de URLs associated with this product. HTTP or HTTPS are valid. HTTPS is prefered.

stock.description: Number of products availble for sale from the seller. Each new successfull order will automatically reduce the number of products available.

attributes.description: List of `key` `value` attributes of this product. This is very important for search and SEO optmization. Include all relevant information

productId.description: Brand Lovers Product Id. Use this to recommend a product association

skuSellerId.description: Unique Product Id (SKU) in the seller system

productGroupId.description: Unique Product Group ID. Products with the same `productGroupId` will be grouped and displayed as a unique entry. Use `productGroupId` to group diferent SKUs that represent diferent colors, sizes, capacities, etc..

title.description: Product name as advertised by manufacturer. This how the product will be displayed in the Marketplace

gtin.description: Array of product EAN and/or ISBN and/or ASIN codes

categories.description: Array of categories associated with this product

images.description: List of valid Product image URLs. HTTP or HTTPS are valid. HTTPS is prefered.

videos.description: List of videos de URLs associated with this product. HTTP or HTTPS are valid. HTTPS is prefered.

stock.description: Number of products availble for sale from the seller. Each new successfull order will automatically reduce the number of products available.

attributes.description: List of `key` `value` attributes of this product. This is very important for search and SEO optmization. Include all relevant information

skuSellerId.description: Unique Product Id (SKU) in the seller system

productGroupId.description: Unique Product Group ID. Products with the same `productGroupId` will be grouped and displayed as a unique entry. Use `productGroupId` to group diferent SKUs that represent diferent colors, sizes, capacities, etc..

title.description: Product name as advertised by manufacturer. This how the product will be displayed in the Marketplace

gtin.description: Array of product EAN and/or ISBN and/or ASIN codes

categories.description: Array of categories associated with this product

images.description: List of valid Product image URLs. HTTP or HTTPS are valid. HTTPS is prefered.

videos.description: List of videos de URLs associated with this product. HTTP or HTTPS are valid. HTTPS is prefered.

stock.description: Number of products availble for sale from the seller. Each new successfull order will automatically reduce the number of products available.

weight.description: Product weight in Grams. No commas or periods are accepeted. For example one killo must be informed as 1000. Another example 1 Kilo and 234 grams should be informed solely as 1234

length.description: Product length in millimeters. No commas or periods are accepeted. For example one meter produc must be informed as 1000. Another example 1 meter and 23 centimeters should be informed solely as 1230

width.description: Product width in millimeters. No commas or periods are accepeted. For example one meter produc must be informed as 1000. Another example 1 meter and 23 centimeters should be informed solely as 1230

height.description: Product height in millimeters. No commas or periods are accepeted. For example one meter produc must be informed as 1000. Another example 1 meter and 23 centimeters should be informed solely as 1230

available.description: Flag that defines if this product is eligible for giftwrapping

value.description: Amount charged for gift wrap. All prices must be provided in cents. No commas or periods are accepeted. For example one dollar should be informed as 100. $1,2345.67 should be informed solely as 1234567

messageSupport.description: Flag that defines if seller supports giftwrapp with a message

occurredAt.description: Date that this shippment was shiped

number.description: Courier unique trackign Id associated with this shipment

sellerShipmentId.description: Unique Seller shipment Id. This must be unique across all orders and shipments

skuSellerId.description: Unique Product Id (SKU) in the seller system. This is the key that defines witch product will be updated

skus.description: Status of the products from the seller

skuSellerId.description: Unique Product Id (SKU) in the seller system.

stock.description: Number of products availble for sale from the seller. Each new successfull order will automatically reduce the number of products available.

skuSellerId.description: Seller product unique Id that will be updated

active.description: Defines if this product is ready for sale. Active `true`, disabled `false`
Defines if this product is ready for sale. Active `true`, disabled `false`

skuSellerId.description: Unique product Id from seller that will be updated

default.description: List price, also known as MSRP (Manufacturer Suggest Retail Price) or the recommended retail price (RRP). All prices must be provided in cents. No commas or periods are accepeted. For example one dollar should be informed as 100. $1,2345.67 should be informed solely as 1234567

offer.description: Product price. This is what will be offered to the customer. All prices must be provided in cents. No commas or periods are accepeted. For example one dollar should be informed as 100. $1,2345.67 should be informed solely as 1234567

skuSellerId.description: Unique Product Id (SKU) in the seller system

crossDockingTime.description: Time it will take to manufacture, prepare or setup this product. Time must be provided in seconds. For example 1 day should be informed as 86400. This time will be included in the product ETA informed to the customer

taxID.description: Courier taxId information. For example CNPJ

cnpj.description: CNPJ responsável pelo envio dos produtos. Pode ser diferente caso a empresa possua diversos Centros de Distribuição (CDs)

serie.description: Número de serie da Nota Fiscal

issuedAt.description: Data de emissão da Nota Fiscal

accessKey.description: Número da chave de acesso à nota fiscal. A chave possui 44 dígitos e contém todas as informações da DANFE

skuSellerId.description: Unique Product Id (SKU) in the seller system

title.description: Product name as advertised by manufacturer. This how the product will be displayed in the Marketplace

gtin.description: Array of product EAN and/or ISBN and/or ASIN codes

status.description: Product status for each marketplace that this product is listed

prices.description: Price information for each marketplace that this product is listed

stocks.description: Invetory information for each marketplace that this product is listed

urls.description: List of URLs where the product is listed for sale

images.description: List of valid Product image URLs.

quantity.description: Quantity of product available for sale

reserved.description: Locked product invetory for orders that are not approved and are not ready to fullfil.

crossDockingTime.description: Time it will take to manufacture, prepare or setup this product. Time must be provided in seconds. For example 1 day should be informed as 86400. This time will be included in the ETA informed to the customer

orderId.description: Unique order Id (related to this seller)

orderMarketplaceId.description: Unique Order Id that will be displayed to the customer. This Id is not the same as `orderId`

createdAt.description: Date that this order was created

approvedAt.description: Date that this order was approved for fullfilment

updatedAt.description: Last update data of this order

totalAmount.description: Order total in cents, this is what the customer will be charged for. No commas or periods are accepeted. For example one dollar should be informed as 100. $1,2345.67 should be informed solely as 1234567

totalItemsAmount.description: Order items total amount in cents. No commas or periods are accepeted. For example one dollar should be informed as 100. $1,2345.67 should be informed solely as 1234567

totalShippingAmount.description: Total shipments amount items. No commas or periods are accepeted. For example one dollar should be informed as 100. $1,2345.67 should be informed solely as 1234567

totalDiscountAmount.description: Total order discounts in cents. No commas or periods are accepeted. For example one dollar should be informed as 100. $1,2345.67 should be informed solely as 1234567

id.description: Seller unique Id in the Brand Lovers Marketplace

name.description: Seller name in the Brand Lovers Marketplace

email.description: Customer Email (when available). Please note: Email is not a mandatory field

type.description: Phone number type, home, office, mobile, etc

skuSellerId.description: Unique Product Id (SKU) in the seller system

sent.description: Flag if product was already shipped

amount.description: Total discount in cents. No commas or periods are accepeted. For example one dollar should be informed as 100. $1,2345.67 should be informed solely as 1234567

available.description: Defines if giftwrpping is available for this product.

value.description: Amount charged for gift wrap. All prices must be provided in cents. No commas or periods are accepeted. For example one dollar should be informed as 100. $1,2345.67 should be informed solely as 1234567

messageSupport.description: Defines if giftwrpping is available for this product.

chargedAmount.description: Shipment cost. Must be informed in cents. No commas or periods are accepeted. For example one dollar should be informed as 100. Same as $1,2345.67 must be informed solely as 1234567

transitTime.description: Deliver time in seconds. Time must be provided in seconds. For example 1 day should be informed as 86400. This time will be included in the product ETA informed to the customer

crossDockingTime.description: Time it will take to manufacture, prepare or setup this product. Time must be provided in seconds. For example 1 day should be informed as 86400. This time will be included in the product ETA informed to the customer

items.description: List of items of this shippment

occurredAt.description: Date time when this shippment happened

number.description: Courier unique trackign Id associated with this shipment

id.description: Shipment Id associated with this shippment used to group diferent item or items from a single order

sellerShipmentId.description: Unique Seller shipment Id. This must be unique across all orders and shipments

items.description: List of Order IDs of this items from this order that will be updated in this shipment

number.description: Unique id shipment Id in the courier system

sellerShipmentId.description: Unique Seller shipment Id. This must be unique across all orders and shipmnents

occurredAt.description: Date time that this was created

sellerShipmentId.description: Unique Seller shipment Id. This must be unique across all orders and shipments

address.description: Address first line (ave, street name, etc..)

complement.description: Complementary info (aptartament number, building name, suite)

countryId.description: Contry code using aplpha ISO-3166, Example: BR, US, AR, GB, CN

orderId.description: Unique order Id that this trouble ticket belongs to

from.description: Friendly name of the person sending this message, if not provided the seller `name` will be used

createdAt.description: Date time that ticket was created

updatedAt.description: Date-time with last update of this ticket

subject.description: Short one line title describing ticket.

sla.description: Date-time with a promisse for the customer when this ticket will be resolved

visibility.description: Defines if this message is `CUSTOMER` (customer will receive a copy) or `INTERNAL`
Defines if this message is `CUSTOMER` (customer will receive a copy) or `INTERNAL`

ticketStatus.description: New trouble ticket status. Valid options are `REOPENED`, `CLOSED`
